name: CubeCounter · NerdMan
description:
Compete with friends and other people around the world!

Simply count the number of blocks falling on the screen as fast as you can. Find the right number and win the game.

* Endless game fun for in-between
* Beautiful cartoon graphics
* Simple game principle

CubeCounter is a Minigame that is part of the Nerdman Social Game. Download the full version for free!
